channel.description: CIS 527 Lab 3 - Email Protocols Electronic Mail (email) Send Messages Across the Internet Developed in 1970s as Extension to FTP Originally Text Only Extended by Multipurpose Internet Mail Extensions (MIME) Email Protocols Simple Mail Transfer Protocol (SMTP) Post Office Protocol (POP3) Internet Message Access Protocol (IMAP) Exchange ActiveSync Email Server Components Mail Transfer Agent (MTA) Mail Delivery Agent (MDA) IMAP/POP/Webmail Server Image Source: Wikipedia cis527@cis527russfeldpuppet:~$ telnet mail.servergrove.com 110 Trying 69.
